Description: !984 Made In Japan BC Rich Mockingbird NJ! built in Nagoya Japan, hence the NJ name, and built by Matsumoku. Quick funny story here..... When BC Rico went to Japan to have an import series made, the people in Japan said, "Oh you want to build copies of the Mockingbird made by Aria?" Seeing the quality of the copies they made, he choose them for the first few runs. 24 Fret, bolt on maple neck, I forget the neck pickup, the bridge is a Dimarrizo FRED, wired to 2 volumes and a tone. A 3 way switch, and that's all you really need. Great action, stays in tune, and has perfect intonation. One of the FASTEST necks I have ever played, and has nice sustain and tone. Yes, it IS almost 35 years old, so expect some small dings and scrapes NOT pictured. Will be shipped with a gig bag. Now the fine print:Please pay within 24 hours of winning the auction.Shipping will be 65.00Shipping in the continental USA ONLY!!!!!!!! Sorry Hawaii, Alaska, Canada, Mexico, and all ships at sea.Shipping ONLY to the verified Paypal address. (No, I won't ship to Aunt Mable's house so you can cross the border to get it.)
Title: 1984 BC Rich Mockingbird NJ ACTUALLY made in JAPAN!
